description.value:
Trigger An adjacent ally who is at least one size smaller than you would be hit by a Strike.

You use your size and leverage to quickly move an ally out of harm's way. Attempt an Athletics check to @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.Shove] the ally targeted by the triggering Strike. If your ally is willing, treat the result as one degree of success higher. On a success, in addition to its normal effects, the Shoved ally also gains a +2 circumstance bonus to their AC against the triggering Strike.

@UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feat-effects.Item.Effect: Assistive Shove]
